notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: A.A.A.-S., M.E.A.E.-H., M.A., and M.A.N. designed the study, collected literature, performed the experiment, analyzed the data, wrote the paper, and drafted the manuscript. S.A.M. conducted the microbiological study and drafted the manuscript. M.M.B. designed the grinding machine for paulownia leaf meal preparation to improve product quality. E.O.S.H, A.N.A., and A.A.S. reviewed the manuscript and performed the final check. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
